# iterator_initializer

## An operation that should be run to initialize this iterator.

## Description
 An operation that should be run to initialize this iterator. 


## Usage
```r
 
iterator_initializer(iterator) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| iterator | An iterator |
